main.name: Elisha Patterson
main.description: Possessing a strong background in retail and software developement, I am transitioning into the data science industry seeking to bring data to life and create unprecedented change in unprecedented times

testimonials.text: Elisha is a part of our internship program and continuously demonstrates positive leadership. We (Renu and I) would like to recognize him for his contribution to the team. Great Job!
testimonials.user: Tatiana Tinsley & Renu Midha, HR managers, Travelport LTD

testimonials.text: I'm very excited and proud of you man. You have been an excellent example of what a young man should strive to be and I'm very blessed to have met you and gotten a chance to work alongside you on various tasks!! God bless you man and I can't wait to see what adventures will unfold for you...
testimonials.user: Jahmal Newton, Colleague, Technology Ambassador's Program

testimonials.text: Elisha, thank you very much for being a perfect partner. You will be an excellent boss. I pray your life is filled with happiness and blessings. So glad to have you as a classmate and a friend.
